name: Pong Tournament Universe
description:
Pong Tournament Universe:

Pong Tournament Universe was created by Spencer Rieu for the Ludum Dare 44 Compo Competition.

This game is about a dad and his journey to save his family from aliens. Life is the currency of the universe and you must battle to save you and your family.

This game has a single player story mode and a local two player mode. The style of the game is a classic pong meets platformer fighting game. Move around the terrain to keep the ball out of your net, and encounter different enemies along your way. Have some fun bashing and smashing your way to victory.

Enter the universe or mortal pong tournaments, help this dad rescue his family and become the next Pong Tournament Universe Champion.

Please enjoy your time playing!
